alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Across Coastal Volusia County... At 758 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery and traffic cameras showed patchy dense fog developing across Coastal Volusia County, especially from around Interstate 95 inland. The fog was reducing visibilities to a quarter of a mile or less. The fog is expected to burn off by around 9 AM. Drivers should prepare to encounter rapid visibility reductions early this morning, especially as the morning rush hour commute approaches. Consider leaving early so that you can arrive safely at your destination at a safe driving speed. When driving in fog, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
